testcase.name: A user should be able to login and be able to add a item to their wishlist and be able to view it on the wishlist page
testcase.system-out: When they type in a valid "StephenTest" and "StephenPass"...................passed And they go to the Home Page they should be able to click add to wishlist on an item.passed Then view that item on the wishlist page....................................passed

testcase.name: Successful checkout
testcase.system-out: Given that a User has an Item in their Cart and is viewing their Cart.......passed When the User clicks the Proceed to Checkout button, then the Place Order button.passed Then the User will have successfully bought the games.......................passed

testcase.name: Trying to checkout with an empty cart
testcase.system-out: Given that a User has an empty Cart and is viewing their Cart...............passed When the User tries to Checkout.............................................passed Then the Cart Page will display that the Cart is empty and the Proceed to Checkout will not be displayed.passed

testcase.name: Games per page
testcase.system-out: Given a User is on the Store Page...........................................passed When the games are displayed................................................passed Then there should be a maximum of twenty-four games displayed per page......passed

testcase.name: View Metacritic review

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given the User is on the Store Page again...................................undefined When when the User clicks on the Metacritic link of a game..................skipped Then there is a valid Metacritic review displayed...........................skipped
